data.name: Boomerang Fu
data.detailed_description:
Every round of Boomerang Fu is a high-stakes showdown with one-hit kills and bouncy boomerang physics. Transform your character from a startled banana into an unstoppable killing machine with persistent powerups like wildfire, ice trails, disguises, telekinesis and more. Powerups stack together between rounds to form dangerous combinations that could turn the tide of battle of backfire hilariously.



Each match of Boomerang Fu can be a finely-balanced ballet of blades or a comedy of errors. Simple controls let newcomers grill, chill and tenderise their opponents within seconds, while advanced players will uncover the hidden depths of this lost martial art by learning to deflect attacks and curve boomerangs around corners. And everyone can use the environment against their foes, setting off traps, hiding in bushes, or pushing one another into treacherous koi ponds.

Frantic action, multiple game modes and a formidable cast of AI opponents make Boomerang Fu the perfect start to a Friday night in with new friends or bitter rivals.

Features


  • Choose from a cute cast of playable food characters
  • Fight with up to 4 friends in slapstick kung fu arenas
  • Stack powerups together in silly or deadly combinations
  • Master the hyper-realistic boomerang physics to get an edge over your enemies
  • Engage in senseless but adorable violence thanks to one-kit kills
  • Use your favourite XBox, PlayStation or Steam controllers

Game modes

  • Deathmatch: Do battle with boomerangs in deadly arenas. Points are awarded for kills or last food standing.
  • Team Up:: Team up against your friends or challenging AI opponents. Don't want a fair fight? Everyone can team up against the best player in the room.
  • Golden Boomerang: Fight to hold onto the golden boomerang in an asymmetric "1 vs many" showdown.

Stackable powerups

  • Caffeinated
  • Dash Through Walls
  • Teleport Boomerang
  • Explosive Boomerang
  • Multi Boomerang
  • Fire Boomerang
  • Ice Boomerang
  • Disguise
  • Shield
  • Telekinesis

data.short_description: Boomerang Fu is a frantic physics fighting game. Choose from an adorable cast of food characters and slice up your friends with boomerangs and a ridiculous range of stackable powerups.
data.reviews:
“Had me laughing out loud, trying to improve, and wanting to keep playing.”
Game Cloud

“It’s quick, it’s frantic, it’s hilarious, and it’s a whole lot of fun.”
Shindig

“Non-stop laughter, and the kind of game that absolutely anyone can get into”
Digitally Downloaded

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 5350, Intel Core i3-2100T or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480M, Radeon HD 6790 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
